verses.verse: I will give you <S%H3034>thanks<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%> Before the <S%H430>gods,<s%> I will sing praises to <S%H2167>you.<s%>

I will <S%H7812>bow<s%> down toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to your <S%H8034>Name<s%> for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and for your <S%H571>truth;<s%> for you have <S%H1431>exalted<s%> your <S%H8034>Name<s%> and your Word above <S%H565>all.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>called,<s%> you <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7292>me.<s%> You encouraged me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will give you <S%H3034>thanks,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H7891>Yes,<s%> they will sing of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3519>glory.<s%>
For though <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7311>high,<s%> yet he <S%H7200>looks<s%> after the <S%H8217>lowly;<s%> but the <S%H1364>proud,<s%> he <S%H3045>knows<s%> from <S%H4801>afar.<s%>

Though I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> you will <S%H2421>revive<s%> <S%H7971>me.<s%> You will stretch forth your <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> will save <S%H3467>me.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1584>fulfill<s%> that which concerns <S%H2617>me;<s%> your loving kindness, <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H7503>Don't<s%> forsake the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
